about_the_game:
RKR is the ultimate maze game where every step could be your last, and every kill brings new power to your arsenal

Dive headfirst into chaos as you RUSH through procedurally-generated levels, each teeming with foes hungry for your blood. Mercilessly KILL everything that stands in your way to claim control of your own personal labyrinth of nightmares. REPEAT the challenge until victory is yours, or until your inevitable demise.

RKR - Rush Kill Repeat FEATURES:

  • Immersive Environments: Navigate through diverse environments such as slippery ice caves and dimly lit passages, each with its own unique music track, adding depth to your journey.
  • High-Stakes Combat: Your enemies die in one shot. But so do you. Exercise precision and caution as you navigate through the maze, ensuring that every shot counts.
  • Optional Power-Ups: Discover optional power-ups like the BloodBag to extend your time, the Teleporter for strategic maneuvering, and the Energy Pulse for devastating area-of-effect attacks.
  • Procedurally Generated Mazes: Experience endless replayability with procedurally generated levels, ensuring that every run offers a fresh and unpredictable challenge.

short_description: With your head, name and purpose taken from you, the only thing that keeps you going is your unquenchable rage... and quickly draining blood. Reclaim what is yours before your blood runs dry.
